trans-unit.source: Provides data for <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Splitter.SplitterMoving"></xref> and the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Splitter.SplitterMoved"></xref> events.
trans-unit.target: Fornece dados para <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Splitter.SplitterMoving"> </xref> e <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Splitter.SplitterMoved"> </xref> eventos.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Splitter.SplitterMoving> event occurs when the user is moving the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Splitter> control.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Splitter.SplitterMoving>evento ocorre quando o usuário está se movendo o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Splitter>controle.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Splitter> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Splitter.SplitterMoving>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Splitter.SplitterMoved> event occurs when the user finishes moving the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Splitter> control.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Splitter.SplitterMoved>evento ocorre quando o usuário termina de mover o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Splitter>controle.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Splitter> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Splitter.SplitterMoved>

trans-unit.source: The SplitterEventArgs class specifies the position of the mouse pointer and the position of the upper-left corner of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Splitter> control.
trans-unit.target: A classe SplitterEventArgs Especifica a posição do ponteiro do mouse e a posição do canto superior esquerdo do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Splitter>controle.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Splitter>

trans-unit.source: Initializes an instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.SplitterEventArgs"></xref> class with the specified coordinates of the mouse pointer and the coordinates of the upper-left corner of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Splitter"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma instância do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.SplitterEventArgs"> </xref> classe com as coordenadas especificadas do ponteiro do mouse e as coordenadas do canto superior esquerdo do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Splitter"> </xref> controle.

trans-unit.source: The x-coordinate of the mouse pointer (in client coordinates).
trans-unit.target: A coordenada x do ponteiro do mouse (nas coordenadas do cliente).

trans-unit.source: The y-coordinate of the mouse pointer (in client coordinates).
trans-unit.target: A coordenada y do ponteiro do mouse (nas coordenadas do cliente).

trans-unit.source: The x-coordinate of the upper-left corner of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Splitter"></xref> (in client coordinates).
trans-unit.target: A coordenada x do canto superior esquerdo do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Splitter"> </xref> (nas coordenadas do cliente).

trans-unit.source: The y-coordinate of the upper-left corner of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Splitter"></xref> (in client coordinates).
trans-unit.target: A coordenada y do canto superior esquerdo do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Splitter"> </xref> (nas coordenadas do cliente).

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the x-coordinate of the upper-left corner of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Splitter"></xref> (in client coordinates).
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define a coordenada x do canto superior esquerdo do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Splitter"> </xref> (nas coordenadas do cliente).

trans-unit.source: You can use this property along with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitterEventArgs.SplitY%2A> property of this class to determine the position of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Splitter> control when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Splitter.SplitterMoving> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Splitter.SplitterMoved> events are raised.
trans-unit.target: Você pode usar essa propriedade juntamente com o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitterEventArgs.SplitY%2A>propriedade dessa classe para determinar a posição do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Splitter>controlar quando o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Splitter.SplitterMoving>e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Splitter.SplitterMoved>os eventos são gerados.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Splitter.SplitterMoved> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Splitter.SplitterMoving> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Splitter> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitterEventArgs.SplitY%2A>

trans-unit.source: The x-coordinate of the upper-left corner of the control.
trans-unit.target: A coordenada x do canto superior esquerdo do controle.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the y-coordinate of the upper-left corner of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Splitter"></xref> (in client coordinates).
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define a coordenada y do canto superior esquerdo do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Splitter"> </xref> (nas coordenadas do cliente).

trans-unit.source: You can use this property along with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitterEventArgs.SplitX%2A> property of this class to determine the position of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Splitter> control when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Splitter.SplitterMoving> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Splitter.SplitterMoved> events are raised.
trans-unit.target: Você pode usar essa propriedade juntamente com o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitterEventArgs.SplitX%2A>propriedade dessa classe para determinar a posição do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Splitter>controlar quando o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Splitter.SplitterMoving>e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Splitter.SplitterMoved>os eventos são gerados.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Splitter.SplitterMoved> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Splitter.SplitterMoving> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Splitter> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitterEventArgs.SplitX%2A>

trans-unit.source: The y-coordinate of the upper-left corner of the control.
trans-unit.target: A coordenada y do canto superior esquerdo do controle.

trans-unit.source: Gets the x-coordinate of the mouse pointer (in client coordinates).
trans-unit.target: Obtém a coordenada x do ponteiro do mouse (nas coordenadas do cliente).

trans-unit.source: You can use this property along with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitterEventArgs.Y%2A> property of this class to determine the current location of the mouse pointer when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Splitter.SplitterMoving> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Splitter.SplitterMoved> events are raised.
trans-unit.target: Você pode usar essa propriedade juntamente com o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitterEventArgs.Y%2A>propriedade dessa classe para determinar o local atual do ponteiro do mouse quando o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Splitter.SplitterMoving>e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Splitter.SplitterMoved>os eventos são gerados.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Splitter.SplitterMoved> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Splitter.SplitterMoving> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitterEventArgs.Y%2A>

trans-unit.source: The x-coordinate of the mouse pointer.
trans-unit.target: A coordenada x do ponteiro do mouse.

trans-unit.source: Gets the y-coordinate of the mouse pointer (in client coordinates).
trans-unit.target: Obtém a coordenada y do ponteiro do mouse (nas coordenadas do cliente).

trans-unit.source: You can use this property along with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitterEventArgs.X%2A> property of this class to determine the current location of the mouse pointer when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Splitter.SplitterMoving> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Splitter.SplitterMoved> events are raised.
trans-unit.target: Você pode usar essa propriedade juntamente com o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitterEventArgs.X%2A>propriedade dessa classe para determinar o local atual do ponteiro do mouse quando o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Splitter.SplitterMoving>e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Splitter.SplitterMoved>os eventos são gerados.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Splitter.SplitterMoved> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Splitter.SplitterMoving> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitterEventArgs.X%2A>

trans-unit.source: The y-coordinate of the mouse pointer.
trans-unit.target: A coordenada y do ponteiro do mouse.
